---
title: "About"
---

This is a tutorial on how to process wrist-worn accelerometer data, going from reading in the data, creating activity counts, estimating non-wear, and estimating steps.

- [John Muschelli](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/faculty/2438/john-muschelli): [https://johnmuschelli.com/](https://johnmuschelli.com/)
- [Lily Koffman](https://www.lilykoff.com/about/)
